details.arabic_diacless: ربنا ظلمناۤ انفسنا وان لم تغفر لـنا وترحمنا لـنكونن من الخٰسرين
details.arabic: رَبَّنَا ظَلَمۡنَاۤ اَنۡفُسَنَا وَاِنۡ لَّمۡ تَغۡفِرۡ لَـنَا وَتَرۡحَمۡنَا لَـنَكُوۡنَنَّ مِنَ الۡخٰسِرِيۡنَ
details.transliteration: Rabbana zalamna anfusina wa il lam taghfir lana wa tarhamna lana kunan minal-khasireen
details.translations: Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves, and if You do not forgive us and have mercy upon us, we will surely be among the losers.

pageTitle: Seeking forgiveness and mercy after sinning [7:23]
